com.tealium.audiencestream

Class AudienceStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.audiencestream.AudienceStream

  • public final class AudienceStream
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for this AudienceStream library.

    enable(com.tealium.audiencestream.AudienceStream.Config) must be called before using any of the other methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AudienceStream.Config
      Required to enable the AudienceStream library.
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnAudienceUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Audience updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners().
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnBadgeUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Badge updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnDateUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Date updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnFlagUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Flag updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnMetricUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Metric updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnProfileUpdatedListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Profile updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()
      static interface  AudienceStream.OnPropertyUpdateListener
      Implementers of this class can subscribe to Property (AKA Trait) updates by adding the listener to getEventListeners()

    • Method Detail

      • getEventListeners

        public static java.util.Collection<java.util.EventListener> getEventListeners()
        Add an EventListener to receive profile update events.

        The EventListeners that receive events are:

        • AudienceStream.OnAudienceUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnBadgeUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnFlagUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnDateUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnMetricUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnPropertyUpdateListener
        • AudienceStream.OnProfileUpdatedListener

      • isEnabled

        public static boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        Whether the AudienceStream library is enabled (enable(Config) has been called).

      • enable

        public static void enable(AudienceStream.Config config)
        Initialize the library with the desired configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - a Config instance. If null or the library is already initialized, a warning will be logged in LogCat and the call will have no effect.

      • disable

        public static void disable()
        Disable the initialized library. If the library was not initialized this call has no effect.

      • sendEvent

        public static void sendEvent(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> data)
        Send an event dispatch to AudienceStream. This method calls send(String, Map) with the first argument as "link" along with the given data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data tied to this event. The values provided by the map are copied into Strings, org.json.JSONArrays, and org.json.JSONObjects depending on their original type.

      • sendView

        public static void sendView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> data)
        Send a view dispatch to AudienceStream. This method calls send(String, Map) with the first argument as "view" along with the
        Parameters:
        data - the data tied to this event. The values provided by the map are copied into Strings, org.json.JSONArrays, and org.json.JSONObjects depending on their original type.

      • send

        public static void send(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> data)
        Send a custom dispatch to AudienceStream.
        Parameters:
        data - the data tied to this event. The values provided by the map are copied into Strings, org.json.JSONArrays, and org.json.JSONObjects depending on their original type.
        See Also:
        com.tealium.audiencestream.AudienceStream#sendEvent(java.util.Map)}., com.tealium.audiencestream.AudienceStream#sendView(java.util.Map)}.

      • joinTrace

        public static void joinTrace(java.lang.String traceId)
        Join an AudienceStream Trace with the given trace id.
        Parameters:
        traceId - Given trace id, typically a 5-digit numerical string.

      • leaveTrace

        public static void leaveTrace()
        Leave an active AudienceStream Trace if one is running.

      • getCachedProfile

        public static Profile getCachedProfile()
        Returns:
        the last fetched profile, it may be null.

      • getVisitorId

        public static java.lang.String getVisitorId()
        Returns:
        the visitor id tied to this installation.
